crypto.name: Another Matrix KE
crypto.desc:
Devrar mr96

Tired of key exchange schemes on weird groups with random operations? Let's go back to our good old matrices!

crypto.name: Spiky Crypto
crypto.desc:
Devrar mr96

There are so many weird groups you can use for a key exchange. I just took one with a funny name.

crypto.name: Stealing Seeds
crypto.desc:
Devrar

I found an interesting way to generate numbers with someone. Wanna try?

misc.name: CableFish
misc.desc:
matpro

Welcome to our platform! Here you can do traffic analysis via TCP, isn't it awesome?

Just specify your filter, we will sanitize it (we want to make sure no sensitive data will be leaked) and you will be given the traffic!

This is a remote challenge, you can connect with:

misc.name: Flags distribution Inc.
misc.desc:
Alberto247

Finally Flags distribution Inc. made a false step! They accidentally exposed their client certificate signing endpoint to the internet... It doesn't seem to be able to sign admin certificates though...

misc.name: ProtolessWaf
misc.desc:
giotino

I found this cool parser for protobuf that does not require a .proto file. I'm using it in a WAF to prevent admin access to my server, I hope it works as expected.

pwn.name: Line crosser
pwn.desc:
orsobruno96

Check out this sick game with dark humour, will you be the first one to cross the line and go too far?

pwn.name: No Headache
pwn.desc:
mebeim

All these complicated memory allocators only give me headaches, so I decided to go with a much simpler implementation. Simpler code = less bugs = no more getting pwned!

pwn.name: RoverMaster
pwn.desc:
Giulia Bonfee

🪐 I'm giving you the keys for the art of mastering rovers... 🪐

https://cloud.cybersecnatlab.it/s/Po7sJdYCDdtwLjy
